text: Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo ceng zai tamen zhiqian huimiele xuduo shidai, wo ceng ba da dishang meiyou ciyu nimen di diwei ciyu tamen, bing cong tiankong jiang gei tamen fengfu de yushui, shi zhu he cong tamen xiamian liuguo. Ranhou, wo yin tamen de zui'e huimiele tamen. Zai tamen zhihou, wo you chuangzaole ling yige shidai.
